00050 class ObexServerDispatcher : public ObexEventHandler {

00180         /* @brief   Indicates completion of a Close() operation.
00181 
00182             @param  result  When 'result' evaluates to \c 'TRUE' it
00183                             indicates successful completion of a \c Close()
00184                             operation, otherwise it was shut down spontaneously.
00185                             Check the error code in the latter case. */
00186         virtual void        OnClose(ObexResult  result);
00187 
00188         /*  @brief  Indicates reception of an OBEX protocol event.
00189 
00190             This notification method is called whenever an ObexMsg is received
00191             which is originated from one of the transport channels the current
00192             \c ObexServerDispatcher instance is listening to.
00193             Derived classes mut implement it to dispatch the various events
00194             resulting from communication using an OBEX-based protocol.
00195 
00196             @param  port_ptr    Port from which the OBEX event was received.
00197             @param  msg         ObexMsg containing the event type and data. */
00198         virtual BOOLEAN     OnChannelsMatch(const ServerPortPtr &   port_ptr,
00199                                             const ObexMsg &         msg) = 0;
00200

00244 /*  ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00245     GetNrOfOpenedTransports
00246     ---------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00247 inline  UINT8   ObexServerDispatcher::GetNrOfOpenedTransports()
00248 const
00249 {
00250     return  m_server_port_cnt;
00251 }// GetNrOfOpenedTransports
00252 
00253 BOOLEAN     ObexServerDispatcher::IsPortPtrValid(const ServerPortPtr &   port_ptr)
00254 {
00255     return  ( port_ptr.Get() != 0 );
00256 }
00257 
00258 BOOLEAN     ObexServerDispatcher::IsActive()
00259 const
00260 {
00261     return IsPortPtrValid(m_active_port_ptr);
00262 }
00263 
00264 BOOLEAN     ObexServerDispatcher::IsActive(const ServerPortPtr &    port_ptr)
00265 const
00266 {
00267     return  ( m_active_port_ptr.Get() ==  port_ptr.Get() );
00268 }
00269 
00270 /*  ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00271     IsShuttingDown
00272     ---------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00273 BOOLEAN     ObexServerDispatcher::IsShuttingDown()
00274 const
00275 {
00276     return  m_server_state.GetBit(IsClosePending);
00277 }// IsShuttingDown
00278 
00279 const String &  ObexServerDispatcher::GetUrlStr()
00280 const
00281 {
00282     return  m_obex_url_str;
00283 }
